name: Cactus Cactus Cactus
description:
This
Is a game about a man,

the Cactusman.

One day, Cactusman meets a cactus who can lead him to the Cactus Lord, but only if he can solve a puzzle.

This is a submission to the Game Jam Low Effort 6 and was made in under 24 hours.

Controls:

Keyboard and Mouse

Movement:- Arrow Keys or Mouse Click

Interact:- Space or Mouse Click

Escape Menu:- Escape Key

Touch Screen

Movement:- Touching destination

Interact:-Touching target

Menu:-Touch with two fingers at once
